Frequency once per hour

You can cast a 3rd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Animal] as an innate spell, but only to summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.Black Bear]. At 10th level, the summon animal spell is heightened to 4th level, and you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Grizzly Bear]. At 12th level, your summon animal innate spell is heightened to 5th level, and you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.Polar Bear]. At 14th level, it's heightened to 6th level, and you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Cave Bear].
